root.name: indexOf()
root.description: Tests to see if a substring is embedded in a String, and returns the index position of the first occurrence of the substring defined in the str parameter. If the str substring is not found within the String, -1 is returned.

parameter.label: str
parameter.description: String: any variable of type String

parameter.label: fromIndex
parameter.description: int: the index from which to start the search
